name: Lost Borderline (itch)
description: Play as a skilled Huntress as she shoots, slashes, and dashes her way through an underground cavern with a mysterious secret... the rules of reality don't apply here. Armed with the ability to warp spacetime with the click of a button, harness the power of the borderlines to tactically wipe out enemies and solve maze-like puzzles. Explore the cursed crystal catacombs of a lost civilization and discover the hidden secrets of the Lost Borderline...
